definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
underground watercourse/archaic variant of 經|经[jing1]
haloalkane (obtained from hydrocarbon by substituting halogen for hydrogen, e.g. chlorobenzene or the CFCs)
alicyclic hydrocarbon (i.e. involving ring other than benzene ring)

sentences.english: A water-base drilling fluid that contains dispersed oil or synthetic hydrocarbon as an internal phase.
sentences.chinese: 分散的油滴或合成烴爲內相的水基鑽井液。

sentences.english: Solid-Phase Synthesis of Enyne and Diyne Precursors.
sentences.chinese: 烯炔和二炔烴前體得固相合成。

sentences.english: Compound M is a gaseous hydrocarbon and on combustion yields carbon dioxide and water.
sentences.chinese: 化合物M是一種氣態的烴，燃燒時生成二氧化碳和水。

sentences.english: Sulphur can influence the chemical compositions of gaseous hydrocarbon produced.
sentences.chinese: 單質硫能夠影響氣態烴產物的化學組成。

sentences.english: The high-stand swamp organic facies just appears in the edge of the basin, and its hydrocarbon generation capacity is the lowest.
sentences.chinese: 高位沼澤有機相由於處於盆地邊緣，對生烴貢獻不大。

sentences.english: Saturation and aromatics affect the ductility of asphalt at low temperature.
sentences.chinese: 飽和烴和芳香烴影響瀝青的低溫延度和粘結性。

sentences.english: The process of changing an open-chain hydrocarbon structure to a closed ring, e. g. , hexane to benzene.
sentences.chinese: 使開鏈烴結構變成閉環烴的過程，例如使己烷變成苯。

sentences.english: Natural gas in these basins is primarily thermal cracking gas from liquid hydrocarbons.
sentences.chinese: 盆地的氣源以液態烴的裂解氣爲主。

sentences.english: The transition metal catalyzed isomerization reactions of acetylenic derivatives were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了過渡金屬催化的炔烴衍生物的異構化反應。

sentences.english: The present invention is method and system for cracking heavy hydrocarbon to prepare low-carbon olefin.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及採用重質烴裂解制低碳烯烴的方法及系統。

sentences.english: The relatively volatile liquid hydrocaroons, is called gas condensates .
sentences.chinese: 較易揮發的液態烴，又稱氣體凝析液。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a method for directly producing liquid hydrocarbon in a coal oil-gas reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 一種從煤巖油氣藏直接生產液體烴的方法。

sentences.english: Dr Keith calls this approach “carbon-neutral hydrocarbons”.
sentences.chinese: Keith博士形象的稱呼它爲“碳中性的烴”。

sentences.english: The Titano-hydrogenation of Alkyne hydrocarbons was studied by the method of G. C. track.
sentences.chinese: 通過色譜跟蹤對炔烴的鈦氫化反應進行了研究。

sentences.english: It is a practicable method for evaluating the hydrocarbon concentration sealing ability of caprock.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種可行的蓋層烴濃度封閉能力評價方法。

sentences.english: Almost all effective depressants contain long hydrocarbon chain and polar polymer.
sentences.chinese: 有效的降凝劑基本都具有長烴鏈和極性基的聚合物。

definition: old variant of 潰|溃[kui4]/to fester/to ulcerate
centigram (old)/single-character equivalent of 釐克|厘克[li2 ke4]
milligram (old)/single-character equivalent of 毫克[hao2 ke4]
of flourishing appearance/sound of a bicycle bell
